verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תֵ֭שֵׁב <S%H3427><s%> When thou sittest לִלְח֣וֹם <S%H3898><s%> to eat אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with מוֹשֵׁ֑ל <S%H4910><s%> with a ruler בִּ֥ין <S%H995><s%> consider תָּ֝בִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> diligently אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> what [is] before

וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <S%H7760><s%> And put שַׂכִּ֣ין <S%H7915><s%> a knife בְּלֹעֶ֑ךָ <S%H3930><s%> to thy throat אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בַּ֖עַל <S%H1167><s%> if thou [be] a man given נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> to appetite אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֭תְאָו <S%H183><s%> Be not desirous לְמַטְעַמּוֹתָ֑יו <S%H4303><s%> of his dainties וְ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> meat כְּזָבִֽים׃ <S%H3577><s%> for they [are] deceitful
אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּיגַ֥ע <S%H3021><s%> Labour לְֽהַעֲשִׁ֑יר <S%H6238><s%> not to be rich מִֽבִּינָתְךָ֥ <S%H998><s%> from thine own wisdom חֲדָֽל׃ <S%H2308><s%> cease

[הֲתָעוּף כ] (הֲתָ֤עִיף <S%H5774><s%> brandish ק) עֵינֶ֥יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes בּ֗וֹ וְֽאֵ֫ינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> is gone כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עָשֹׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> upon that which is not? for [riches] certainly יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> make לּ֣וֹ כְנָפַ֑יִם <S%H3671><s%> themselves wings כְּ֝נֶ֗שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> as an eagle [וְעָיֵף כ] (יָע֥וּף <S%H5774><s%> brandish ק) הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> toward heaven פ

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּלְחַ֗ם <S%H3898><s%> Eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> thou not the bread רַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> of [him that hath] an evil עָ֑יִן <S%H5869><s%> eye וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay [תִּתְאָו כ] (תִּ֝תְאָ֗יו <S%H183><s%> desire ק) לְמַטְעַמֹּתָֽיו׃ <S%H4303><s%> thou his dainty meats

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> he שָׁעַ֥ר <S%H8176><s%> For as he thinketh בְּנַפְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> in his heart כֶּ֫ן־ <S%H3651><s%> so ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> to you אֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> so [is] he Eat וּ֭שְׁתֵה <S%H8354><s%> and drink יֹ֣אמַר <S%H559><s%> saith לָ֑ךְ וְ֝לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> he to thee but his heart בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> up

פִּֽתְּךָ־ <S%H6595><s%> The morsel אָכַ֥לְתָּ <S%H398><s%> [which] thou hast eaten תְקִיאֶ֑נָּה <S%H6958><s%> shalt thou vomit up וְ֝שִׁחַ֗תָּ <S%H7843><s%> and lose דְּבָרֶ֥יךָ <S%H1697><s%> words הַנְּעִימִֽים׃ <S%H5273><s%> thy sweet

בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> not in the ears כְ֭סִיל <S%H3684><s%> of a fool אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָ֝ב֗וּז <S%H936><s%> for he will despise לְשֵׂ֣כֶל <S%H7922><s%> the wisdom מִלֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H4405><s%> of thy words

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּ֭סֵּג <S%H5253><s%> Remove גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> landmark עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> not the old וּבִשְׂדֵ֥י <S%H7704><s%> not into the fields יְ֝תוֹמִ֗ים <S%H3490><s%> of the fatherless אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּבֹֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> and enter

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For גֹאֲלָ֥ם <S%H1350><s%> For their redeemer חָזָ֑ק <S%H2389><s%> [is] mighty הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He יָרִ֖יב <S%H7378><s%> he shall plead אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִיבָ֣ם <S%H7379><s%> their cause אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> against

הָבִ֣יאָה <S%H935><s%> Apply לַמּוּסָ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> unto instruction לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart וְ֝אָזְנֶ֗ךָ <S%H241><s%> and thine ears לְאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> to the words דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> of knowledge

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּמְנַ֣ע <S%H4513><s%> Withhold מִנַּ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> from the child מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> not correction כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Although תַכֶּ֥נּוּ <S%H5221><s%> for [if] thou beatest בַ֝שֵּׁ֗בֶט <S%H7626><s%> him with the rod לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> he shall not die

אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> you בַּשֵּׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> him with the rod תַּכֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H5221><s%> Thou shalt beat וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul מִשְּׁא֥וֹל <S%H7585><s%> from hell תַּצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> and shalt deliver

בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if חָכַ֣ם <S%H2449><s%> be wise לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> if thine heart יִשְׂמַ֖ח <S%H8055><s%> shall rejoice לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> my heart גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> even mine
וְתַעְלֹ֥זְנָה <S%H5937><s%> shall rejoice כִלְיוֹתָ֑י <S%H3629><s%> Yea my reins בְּדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speak שְׂ֝פָתֶ֗יךָ <S%H8193><s%> when thy lips מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> right things

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יְקַנֵּ֣א <S%H7065><s%> envy לִ֭בְּךָ <S%H3820><s%> Let not thine heart בַּֽחַטָּאִ֑ים <S%H2400><s%> sinners כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but בְּיִרְאַת־ <S%H3374><s%> but [be thou] in the fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> all the day

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> For surely there is אַחֲרִ֑ית <S%H319><s%> an end וְ֝תִקְוָתְךָ֗ <S%H8615><s%> and thine expectation לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִכָּרֵֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> shall not be cut off

שְׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בְנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> thou my son וַחֲכָ֑ם <S%H2449><s%> and be wise וְאַשֵּׁ֖ר <S%H833><s%> and guide בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> not be with בְסֹֽבְאֵי־ <S%H5433><s%> heavy יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine בְּזֹלֲלֵ֖י <S%H2151><s%> among riotous eaters בָשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> of flesh לָֽמוֹ׃

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For סֹבֵ֣א <S%H5433><s%> For the drunkard וְ֭זוֹלֵל <S%H2151><s%> and the glutton יִוָּרֵ֑שׁ <S%H3423><s%> shall come to poverty וּ֝קְרָעִ֗ים <S%H7168><s%> [a man] with rags תַּלְבִּ֥ישׁ <S%H3847><s%> shall clothe נוּמָֽה׃ <S%H5124><s%> and drowsiness

שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hearken לְ֭אָבִיךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thy father זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> who יְלָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3205><s%> that begat וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּ֝ב֗וּז <S%H936><s%> thee and despise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when זָקְנָ֥ה <S%H2204><s%> when she is old אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H517><s%> not thy mother

אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> the truth קְ֭נֵה <S%H7069><s%> Buy וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּמְכֹּ֑ר <S%H4376><s%> and sell חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> [it] not [also] wisdom וּמוּסָ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> and instruction וּבִינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> and understanding

[גֹּול כ] (גִּ֣יל <S%H1523><s%> be glad ק) [יָגֹול כ] (יָ֭גִיל <S%H1523><s%> be glad ק) אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> The father צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous [יֹולֵד כ] (וְיֹולֵ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> bear ק) חָ֝כָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> a wise [וְיִשְׂמַח־ כ] (יִשְׂמַח־ <S%H8055><s%> will be glad בּֽוֹ׃ <S%H8055><s%> [child] shall have joy ק)
יִֽשְׂמַח־ <S%H8055><s%> shall be glad אָבִ֥יךָ <S%H1><s%> Thy father וְאִמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H517><s%> and thy mother וְ֝תָגֵ֗ל <S%H1523><s%> thee shall rejoice יֽוֹלַדְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3205><s%> and she that bare

תְּנָֽה־ <S%H5414><s%> give בְנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> My son לִבְּךָ֣ <S%H3820><s%> me thine heart לִ֑י וְ֝עֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> and let thine eyes דְּרָכַ֥י <S%H1870><s%> my ways [תִּרְצֶנָה כ] (תִּצֹּֽרְנָה <S%H7521><s%> accept ק)

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שׁוּחָ֣ה <S%H7745><s%> ditch עֲמֻקָּ֣ה <S%H6013><s%> [is] a deep זוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2181><s%> For a whore וּבְאֵ֥ר <S%H875><s%> pit צָ֝רָ֗ה <S%H6862><s%> [is] a narrow נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5237><s%> and a strange woman

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Surely הִ֭יא <S%H1931><s%> as כְּחֶ֣תֶף <S%H2863><s%> as [for] a prey תֶּֽאֱרֹ֑ב <S%H693><s%> She also lieth in wait וּ֝בוֹגְדִ֗ים <S%H898><s%> the transgressors בְּאָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> among men תּוֹסִֽף׃ <S%H3254><s%> and increaseth

לְמִ֨י <S%H4310><s%> Who א֥וֹי <S%H188><s%> Woe לְמִ֪י <S%H4310><s%> Who אֲב֡וֹי <S%H17><s%> sorrow לְמִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who [מִדֹונִים כ] (מִדְיָנִ֨ים <S%H4066><s%> brawling ק) לְמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who שִׂ֗יחַ <S%H7879><s%> babbling לְ֭מִי <S%H4310><s%> Who פְּצָעִ֣ים <S%H6482><s%> has wounds חִנָּ֑ם <S%H2600><s%> without לְ֝מִ֗י <S%H4310><s%> Who חַכְלִל֥וּת <S%H2448><s%> has redness עֵינָֽיִם׃ <S%H5869><s%> affliction

לַֽמְאַחֲרִ֥ים <S%H309><s%> They that tarry long עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַיָּ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> at the wine לַ֝בָּאִ֗ים <S%H935><s%> they that go לַחְקֹ֥ר <S%H2713><s%> to seek מִמְסָֽךְ׃ <S%H4469><s%> mixed wine

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֥רֶא <S%H7200><s%> Look יַיִן֮ <S%H3196><s%> not thou upon the wine כִּ֪י <S%H3588><s%> when יִתְאַ֫דָּ֥ם <S%H119><s%> when it is red כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> when it giveth [בַּכִּיס כ] (בַּכֹּ֣וס <S%H3599><s%> bag ק) עֵינ֑וֹ <S%H5869><s%> his colour יִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [when] it moveth בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> itself aright
אַ֭חֲרִיתוֹ <S%H319><s%> At the last כְּנָחָ֣שׁ <S%H5175><s%> like a serpent יִשָּׁ֑ךְ <S%H5391><s%> it biteth וּֽכְצִפְעֹנִ֥י <S%H6848><s%> like an adder יַפְרִֽשׁ׃ <S%H6567><s%> and stingeth

עֵ֭ינֶיךָ <S%H5869><s%> Thine eyes יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall behold זָר֑וֹת <S%H2114><s%> strange women וְ֝לִבְּךָ֗ <S%H3820><s%> and thine heart יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> shall utter תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <S%H8419><s%> perverse things

וְ֭הָיִיתָ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּשֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> Yea thou shalt be as he that lieth down בְּלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> in the midst יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וּ֝כְשֹׁכֵ֗ב <S%H7901><s%> or as he that lieth בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the top חִבֵּֽל׃ <S%H2260><s%> of a mast

הִכּ֥וּנִי <S%H5221><s%> They have stricken בַל־ <S%H1077><s%> did not חָלִיתִי֮ <S%H2470><s%> me [shalt thou say and] I was not sick הֲלָמ֗וּנִי <S%H1986><s%> they have beaten בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> did not יָ֫דָ֥עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> me [and] I felt מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> When אָקִ֑יץ <S%H6974><s%> [it] not when shall I awake א֝וֹסִ֗יף <S%H3254><s%> it yet אֲבַקְשֶׁ֥נּוּ <S%H1245><s%> ? I will seek עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again
